item.title: 2018-09-19 Board Meeting
item.description: I. Call to Order II. Roll Call Board Members Present President - Jacob Walker Vice President - Julia Winegeart Secretary - Richard Sharp Treasurer - Casey Woolfolk Director - Sandip Southekal Director - Seth Etter Absent None Guests None III. Approval of Minutes IV. Old Business a. Leadership info is on website. b. Sandip is looking into insurance. c. Bank account d.

item.title: 2018-08-08 Board Meeting
item.description: I. Call to Order Called to order at 6:06 by Casey Woolfolk II. Roll Call Board Members Present President - Jacob Walker Vice President - Julia Winegeart Secretary - Richard Sharp Treasurer - Casey Woolfolk Director - Sandip Southekal Director - Seth Etter Absent None Guests None III. Approval of Minutes Motion: I move to accept the minutes from our prior meeting as presented.

item.title: 2018-07-18 Board Meeting
item.description: I. Call to Order Called to order by Casey Woolfolk at 6:05 PM. II. Roll Call Board Members Present Jacob Walker Julia Winegeart Casey Woolfolk Sandip Southekal Absent Seth Etter Guests None III. Approval of Agenda IV. New Business a. Appoint a Temporary Chair and Secretary Motion: I move that Casey Woolfolk be appointed as temporary chair for this meeting.
